scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C apps/ui typecheck && pnpm -C packages/shared-types typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/ui lint && cargo clippy --manifest-path apps/desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml --all-targets
scripts.format: pnpm -C apps/ui format && cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml
scripts.test: pnpm -C apps/ui test && cargo test --manifest-path apps/desktop/src-tauri/Cargo.toml
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/ui build && pnpm tauri build
